attributes.action: Do not send male refugees to Rwanda.
attributes.additional_details: This is a shameful approach which lowers the standing of the UK in the world, is unkind, and punishes victims, not the human traffickers.
attributes.background: There are very few legal routes into the UK, and claimants can only make a claim once on UK soil. Hence they are forced to seek illegal routes of access. Once here, 1/2 to 2/3rds of claimants are judged to be valid.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614913
